message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.MM 

This paper is about saliency detection, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper proposes a novel attention mechanism for learning to selectively attend to informative context locations at each pixel, which involves machine learning techniques such as neural networks and attention mechanisms. Therefore, it is also likely to belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The proposed method involves the use of convolutional neural networks (CNNs), which is a popular technique in deep learning, making cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) another likely category. Finally, the paper also evaluates the proposed method on salient object detection, semantic segmentation, and object detection, which are all related to computer vision, making cs.MM (Multimedia) another possible category.
